alert.note: Alert for Laclede; Maries (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued March 06 at 9:01PM CST until March 07 at 7:00AM CST by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 AM CST MONDAY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Portions of central, east central, and southwest Missouri, including the following counties, in central Missouri, Maries and Pulaski. In east central Missouri, Phelps. In southwest Missouri, Laclede. * WHEN...Until 300 AM CST. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 901 PM CST, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. Between 1 and 2 inches of rain have fallen. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Northern Fort Leonard Wood, Lebanon, Waynesville, St. Robert, Richland, Dixon, Conway and Doolittle. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Many flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.
